Group hierarchy: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
The instance types have been increased in size for the web and app tier and also the RDS instance have been increased in size.
Besides that the elastic load balancer capacity have been significantly increased. It is expected that this will have the greater impact in application performance under high traffic.
